product_name: REI Mesh X-Large Stuff Sack - 7.5 x 19
long_description: Use this convenient mesh stuff sack to keep organized or to air-dry items. Durable polyester mesh construction with double-stitched and taped seams offers lasting service. Drawcord with cordlock ecurely closes sack opening; 0.75-inch webbing loop at opening for hanging or attachment. Color-coded mesh provides easy size identification. Available in sizes Medium through X X Large.
short_description: Use this convenient mesh stuff sack to keep organized or to air-dry items.
